traits.locale_text: The Marksman's next shot costs -1 AP less (minimum 1) but suffers a -30 Ballistic Skill penalty. This ability does not end the Marksman's movement for the turn.

The next ranged area attack made by the Marksman deals +<u>((50 + 10 × BS bonus) / number of enemies in the area of effect)</u>% damage and has an additional +<u>(10 + 2 × BS bonus)</u>% dodge penetration.
